# servusnumre
*Python3 module with regex patterns related to numbers.*

## Installation
### Install with pip
```
pip3 install -U servusnumre
```

## Usage
```
In [1]: import servusnumre

In [2]: servusnumre.float_pattern

Out[2]: '[-+]?[0-9]*[\\.,]?[0-9]+'

In [3]: servusnumre.exponent_pattern

Out[3]: '[eE]?[-+]?[0-9]?'
```
